name: bigquery_to_gcs
description: A pipeline to extract data from BigQuery tables and store as parquet files in GCS

parameters.name: config_path
parameters.label: Configuration file path
parameters.helpText: GCS path to the configuration file (gs://bucket-name/path/to/config.json)

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: Project ID
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud project ID to run the pipeline in

parameters.name: region
parameters.label: Region
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud region to run the pipeline in
